title: Spyware linked to Khashoggi killing used to hack phones of journalists, activists: report
content:
1. Spyware linked to Khashoggi killing used to hack phones of journalists, activists: report  New York Post
  2. Private spy software sold by NSO Group found on cellphones worldwide  The Washington Post
  3. Data breach reveals extensive government spying on journalists and political activists  WSWS
  4. 'Eloquently nasty' Israeli spyware reportedly used on journalists, dissidents  The Week Magazine
  5. Invisible surveillance: How spyware is secretly hacking smartphones  Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: カショギ氏殺害に関連したスパイウェアがジャーナリストや活動家の携帯電話のハッキングに使用されていた：報告書
报道称与卡舒吉遇害案有关的间谍软件被用来入侵记者和活动家的手机
報道稱與卡舒吉遇害案有關的間諜軟件被用來入侵記者和活動家的手機
